My doc, Doctor Khan (M-B-B-S, M-D, A-I-I-M-S), bless his soul, said it was likely I-B-S, or Irritable Bowel Syndrome for those of us who aren't fluent in medical jargon. My culinary life was crumbling faster than a poorly constructed building in Mumbai monsoon.
